header.title: Vehicle Permit Check
header.subtitle: A pilot service by SF Civic Tech

footer.partnershipLine2: the City and County of San Francisco

home.heading: Is your vehicle in the permit system?
home.instructions: Enter your license plate number to see if you qualify for a permit.
home.databaseNote: This tool lets you check if your vehicle was recorded in the City’s Large Vehicle database as of May 31, 2025.
home.noPlateDescription: If you don’t have a plate, or don’t know what to enter, attend a Community Event for help.

search.notFoundTitle: We couldn’t find your vehicle in the system
search.notFoundInstruction: Please double-check the license plate number you entered.
search.appealCardText: If the number is correct, you may still qualify — submit an appeal or attend a Community Event for help.
search.foundTitle: Good news! Your vehicle is in the system
search.foundInstruction: You may qualify for a Large Vehicle Permit. Attend an upcoming Community Event to apply.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Outlines the types of information we gather when you visit this site, and the steps we take to safeguard it.
privacy.infoCollectionP1: We do not collect personal information about you when you visit our website.
privacy.infoCollectionP2: We collect limited non-personally identifying information your browser makes available automatically whenever you visit a website. This information includes the Internet Address of your computer or network, the date, time, and page you visited on our site, your browser and operating system, and the referring page (the last webpage you visited before clicking on a link to our site).
privacy.infoCollectionP3: We use this aggregated anonymized information from all of our visitors to measure server performance and improve the content of our site.
privacy.infoYouProvideP1: When you fill out a form, the information you submit will be used in the context of that form.
privacy.infoYouProvideP2: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information. However, no data transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.infoYouProvideP3: We do not give, share, sell, rent or transfer any personal information to a third party.
privacy.siteAnalyticsP1: We use a tool called "PostHog" to help understand how visitors interact with our website so that we can improve the website. We do not collect personal information using PostHog. No cookies are used by PostHog.
privacy.linksP1: Our website contains links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices and encourage you to review their policies.
privacy.siteSecurityP1: We monitor network traffic to identify unauthorized attempts to upload or change information or to otherwise cause damage to the site. Anyone using this website expressly consents to such monitoring.
privacy.siteSecurityP2: We take appropriate security measures to protect unauthorized access, alteration or destruction of data.
privacy.policyChangesP1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We expect most such changes to be minor, but we will post those changes as they occur.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.subtitle: Terms of use, liability and browser compatibility.
disclaimer.liabilityText: Under no circumstances shall SF Civic Tech be liable for any actions taken or omissions made from reliance on any information contained herein from whatever source nor shall SF Civic Tech be liable for any other consequences from any such reliance.
disclaimer.browserText: SF Civic Tech supports the latest versions of Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, and Safari in standard view, as well as Safari and Chrome for mobile.
